Submodules¶

sklite.all_ module¶

Importing all the implemented models and storing them in a dict.

sklite.lazy_ module¶

Abstraction for lazy export of sklearn models to dart/Flutter.

class sklite.lazy_.Export(estimator, **kwargs)¶

Bases: sklite.lib.abstract.Abstract

Lazy export abstraction for fast access to all the available implementations.

Parameters
estimatormixed

A fitted sklearn model from the supported groups described in sklite.all_.AVAILABLE_.

**kwargsdict

All parameters here are used in the saving phase. automatically, unless the methods responsible for each of those isn’t explicitly called.

“save_meta” - Saves meta information about the fitted model. “pickle_model” - Creates a pickle to a specified location on disk.

Raises
sklite.lib.exceptions.UnsupportedModel
build(self) → dict¶

Overrides the build method from sklite.lib.abstract. Uses the build method from the sklite class.

Returns
dict
save_meta(self) → None¶

Saves the class meta in a separate file.

Returns
None
save_pickle(self)¶

Saves a pickle of the classifier passed in the constructor.

Returns
None
set_path(self, new_path) → None¶

Sets the default path where the meta class and the pickle file should be stored.

Parameters
new_pathstr

Full path to the new location.

Returns
None

Module contents¶

SkLite: export scikit-learn models to Flutter/Dart.

For more documentation, please visit https://github.com/axegon/sklite
